<h3 id="X35621">X(35621) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER  OF THESE TRIANGLES: INVERSE-IN-CONWAY AND 6th MIXTILINEAR</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^4+(3*b^2+b*c+3*c^2)*a^3-(b^3+c^3)*a^2-(b^2-b*c+c^2)*(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b*c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(35621) = 3*X(165)-4*X(20368)</b>
<p>X(35621) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {20,35633}, {43,29311}, {167,35644}, {200,35614}, {314,3062}, {516,10453}, {573,26102}, {1125,1695}, {1699,3741}, {1709,35626}, {1750,10477}, {1766,32913}, {2051,29827}, {2951,35892}, {3840,9535}, {4326,35617}, {4649,16435}, {5208,5732}, {5223,11679}, {5531,35649}, {5573,21769}, {5691,10449}, {6996,32853}, {7988,10478}, {7989,10479}, {7992,35635}, {7993,35636}, {7996,10444}, {8001,35639}, {8089,35624}, {8090,35625}, {8140,35618}, {8244,35622}, {8245,35623}, {8423,35627}, {8580,35628}, {9315,23441}, {9851,35629}, {10862,30291}, {10886,30308}, {10887,30315}, {10888,30326}, {10889,30330}, {10892,30363}, {11519,35634}, {11894,30371}, {11895,30395}, {11896,30394}, {12404,35630}, {12565,35632}, {12767,35638}, {13069,35643}, {13101,35646}, {16143,35637}, {18229,30393}, {19542,33087}, {19645,32919}, {21363,25502}, {31573,35648}, {31574,35647}, {34033,34045}, {35640,35673}</p>
<p>
X(35621) = reflection of X(9535) in X(3840)<br>
X(35621) = X(6638)-of-3rd Conway triangle<br>
X(35621) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 1764, 165), (1, 11021, 30350), (1, 11521, 16189), (1, 12435, 11531), (40, 35631, 1), (46, 7373, 11493), (57, 21334, 1), (260, 3601, 3953), (1403, 17595, 18398), (1470, 5348, 3072), (1764, 10439, 1), (2078, 9627, 18956), (2448, 18330, 18956), (3340, 26399, 3338), (5173, 22766, 26399), (5363, 7146, 10475), (5570, 33658, 1771), (5597, 20764, 5902), (10441, 10476, 1), (10474, 11509, 5228)<br>
</p>
